function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential negative impacts of social responses to the pandemic on contagious disease propagation","Impact":"Increase in the spread of contagious diseases due to ineffective or improper response measures","Mitigation":"Implementing effective and science-backed social response measures, proper financing, and capacity building","Technologies":"Monitoring technologies, emergency management systems, and medical infrastructure","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Ambiguity in the interpretation of the Christmas effect and Coronavirus effect in altering routines and practices","Impact":"Confusion and inconsistency in response to crisis measures, leading to a higher risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Clear and consistent communication of crisis response measures, education on best practices, and community engagement","Technologies":"Communication technologies, educational platforms, and community engagement tools","People":"General public, community leaders, and policymakers","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Risk of inadequate financing of social responses leading to a lack of capacity to manage emergency measures","Impact":"Inability to effectively monitor and manage emergency measures, leading to uncontrolled disease spread","Mitigation":"Appropriate and sufficient financing of social responses, investment in healthcare infrastructure, and resource allocation for emergency management","Technologies":"Funding and resource allocation tools, emergency management systems, and healthcare technology","People":"Healthcare workers, emergency responders, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, and funding agencies"}]}
